PLAY

PileBlocks is a play-to-earn strategy game on the Everscale blockchain where players complete images from tiles together.

Current game: “The Magic of Solana Lands”, 01.09.2022 - 31.09.2022

JOIN

Watch Quick Game Guide

Game Rules

Every month a fresh map appears. The map has 100 territories. Each of these territories becomes available for capturing only at a certain point of time
